verbLexeme: 1. To calculate the points of opposing teams or competitors have made in a game. English = score, keep score, tally, tally up.
2. To be a large number of something; to be lots of something.
nominalLexeme: 1. The points each of the opposing teams or competitors have made in a game. English = score, tally.
2. A person who calculates the points of opposing teams or competitors have made in a game. English = scorer.
